summary: A diffusion pipeline that performs text‑guided image editing using the LEDits++ method on top of Stable Diffusion XL, handling image encoding, prompt encoding, latent preparation, denoising with guidance, and optional invisible watermarking.
business_intent: Provide creators, marketers, and designers with a high‑quality tool to modify existing images according to natural‑language instructions, enabling rapid visual content generation and customization.
